title: Home - Shanghai Herbs and Acupuncture
cleaned_text: Heal with Shanghai Herbs and Acupuncture Traditional Chinese Medicine Dr Wang has been a dedicated practitioner of Traditional Chinese Medicine for over 35 years. We treat all your health concerns with various forms of Herbal Medicine, Acupuncture, Cupping, Reflexology and Massage. Traditional Chinese Medicine is broad range of medicine practices sharing common theoretical concepts which have been developed in China and are based on a tradition of more than 5000 years, including various forms of Herbal Medicine, Acupuncture, Massage and Dietary Therapy. Learn more about what we do We Can Treat Acne, Eczema, Psoriasis, Pelvic Infection, Asthma, Impotence, Infertility, Fibroids, Menopause, Nephritis, Thyroid, Depression, Stress, Insomnia, Anaemia, Indigestion, Hay Fever, Sinusitis, Sciatica, Sports Injuries, Stiff Neck, Hepatitis, Diabetes, Arthritis, Gout, Rheumatism, Headache, Hair Loss, Prostatitis, Diarrhoea, Stroke, Tinnitus, Stop Smoking, Back Pain, Neck Pain, Tendonitis, Shoulder Pain, Tennis Elbow, Hand and Foot Pain, Knee Pain [](services) Address 235 Kingsland Road
